messages.title: You can’t trust Boris Johnson’s Tories.
messages.content: Boris Johnson represents a privileged elite that has failed the country. A decade of Conservative cuts has damaged our economy, our communities and our public services.

messages.title: It’s time for real change.
messages.content: Labour stands for the real change Britain needs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Reward workers, pensioners and those in need, not just the richest
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour aims to shift focus on rewarding workers, pensioners and those in need rather than just the wealthiest individuals.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Increase funding for the NHS with more nurses and doctors to give patients the care they need
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour proposes to increase funding for the NHS which includes hiring more nurses and doctors to enhance patient care.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: End homelessness and make housing affordable to rent or buy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has plans to end homelessness and to make housing more affordable for renting or purchasing.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will initiate a Green Industrial Revolution to address the climate crisis and create jobs that are high skilled and well paid.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Invest in every community, delivering good jobs and the skills people need, so that no one is held back or left behind
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour intends to invest in all communities ensuring the availability of good jobs and essential skills, preventing anyone from being disadvantaged or excluded.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Get Brexit sorted by giving the people the final say
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour wants to resolve Brexit by allowing the public to have the final decision.

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit sorted by giving the people the final say
issues.economy: Boris Johnson represents a privileged elite that has failed the country. A decade of Conservative cuts has damaged our economy
issues.environment: Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs
issues.health: Increase funding for the NHS with more nurses and doctors to give patients the care they need
issues.socialWelfare: Reward workers, pensioners and those in need, not just the richest

housing.content: End homelessness and make housing affordable to rent or buy
